snippet: Since registering to vote when she was 19, Rosanell Eaton, a lifelong North Carolina resident, has navigated around efforts to disenfranchise and intimidate her....
lead_paragraph: Since registering to vote when she was 19, Rosanell Eaton, a lifelong North Carolina resident, has navigated around efforts to disenfranchise and intimidate her.

headline.main: At 95, Continuing the Fight for the Right to Vote in North Carolina
